home.title: Welcome to devtechly
home.subtitle: devtechly is your trusted partner for digital innovation. We specialize in building modern web applications and robust e-commerce platforms with CMS integration. Our mission is to empower your business with the latest web technologies and deliver solutions tailored to your needs.

heroCard1.title: Custom Solutions
heroCard1.desc: Development tailored to your specific needs

heroCard3.title: Ongoing Support
heroCard3.desc: Support at every step of your project

home.servicesSubtitle: Complete web solutions to transform your digital presence

service1.title: Custom Web Application Development
service1.desc: Scalable, secure, and high-performance web apps for any business need.

service2.title: E-commerce Website Development
service2.desc: Online stores with seamless CMS integration, payment gateways, and inventory management.

service3.title: Content Management Systems (CMS)
service3.desc: Flexible and user-friendly CMS solutions for easy website management.

home.whyChooseSubtitle: Advantages that make a difference for your project

why1.title: Experienced Team
why1.desc: Experienced team of web developers and designers
why1.detail: Experienced team of web developers and designers

why3.title: Fast Delivery
why3.desc: Agile development process for faster delivery
why3.detail: Agile development process for faster delivery

why4.title: Cutting-Edge Tech
why4.desc: Cutting-edge web technologies and best practices
why4.detail: Cutting-edge web technologies and best practices

why6.title: Quality Guaranteed
why6.desc: Commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction
why6.detail: Rigorous testing and optimal code quality

home.ctaTitle: Ready to start your web project?
home.ctaDesc: Contact us today to discuss your needs and get a free consultation!
